metadata.title: CVE-2020-8161 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: A directory traversal vulnerability exists in rack < 2.2.0 that allows an attacker perform directory traversal vulnerability in the Rack::Directory app that is bundled with Rack which could result in information disclosure. It was discovered that Rack incorrectly handled certain paths. An attacker could possibly use this issue to obtain sensitive information.

criterions.comment: ruby-rack package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.1.1-5').
